page.title: 04Housing
page.content: Class 2 wrote a questionaire about housing which they took home for their parents to fill in.We used the computer to work out the averages of some of our imformation.Here are some of our results.The average number of {people in our homes}was 4.4,and the average number of{rooms}in the house was 8.7. In our houses the average number of{windows}was 12.4.Most of our homes are built of{brick.}3 of the 23 in our survey are built of{wattle and {daub}and one of{stone.}Most of the houses were{heated}by coke or coal,a few by wood fires and electricity , 4 by oil and 2 by calor gas.Ombersley does not have mains gas but calor gas can be delivered by a lorry .Many houses in Ombersley are old,we found that the{average age}of our houses was 121 years.
